name: Simple Harmonic Motion Game
description:
A game about simple harmonic motion.

A red ball sinusoidally oscillates about an equilibrium line.

By shifting that equilibrium line, you can control the movement of the ball.

Your job is to use the equilibrium line to help the ball avoid obstacles and keep within the boundaries of the screen.

Your score is how far you have gotten before the ball eventually knocks into an obstacle (or the edge of the screen).

Try to delay the inevitable. Good luck! 

Tools used:

- Godot 3.4.2

- GIMP

- Inkscape

- sfxr

This game is a submission for the Ludum Dare 50 Game Jam, "Delay the inevitable".
